channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street cleaning, 12th October
item.description:
Ceres Road again is absolutely filthy. The road has not been cleaned thoroughly for weeks now. A joining Kashgar Road is also the same. Fallen leaves clog up the kerbside, previous grey leaf collection bags still on roadside uncollected on Ceres Road Fly tipping mess scattered bottom Ceres Road adjoining Kashgar road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ceres Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large grafitti tag on galvanised steel shutters of the Dry Cleaner's at 226, Venner Rd, Penge on the corner with Newlands Park., 12th October
item.description:
Large grafitti tag on galvanised steel shutters of the Dry Cleaner's at 226, Venner Rd, Penge on the corner with Newlands Park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newlands Park, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge, wardrobe, pallets, garbage bags, 12th October
item.description:
This fly tipping has been here for 5 months. I reported 2 months ago and nothing ha been made, the problem just increase (wooden pallets and garbage bags are there noe). I saw foxes there in the evening, it's becoming their home soon. I'm desperate, struggling to understand who to report to solve it. My next step will be to take it to the local newspaper, it s already become public health issue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Quebec Way, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gazebo frame dumped, 12th October
item.description:
14 Paston Close had a gazebo up. Now their gazebo is gone + the frame of a gazebo has been dumped on the green next to their house. This was dumped at some point on Saturday 11 October, as it was not there on Saturday morning
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Paston Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 11/10/25 - Near 10 Shortlands Rd, Shortlands, the Width Limit rectangular blue warning sign is rotated about 80 degrees away from approaching traffic., 12th October
item.description:
11/10/25 - Near 10 Shortlands Rd, Shortlands, the Width Limit rectangular blue warning sign is rotated about 80 degrees away from approaching traffic. Please find a permanent solution as this has been reported about 5 times in 3 years eg put a pair of bolts through the pole and sign. My apologies for mixing up this width limit sign with the Low Bridge sign nearby. The Low Bridge sign has been straightened up. The Width Limit sign repair still needs doing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shortlands Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 116 Fortune Green Rd - Badly damaged EV street charging point, 12th October
item.description:
Following a RTC, the vehicle has badly damaged a EV street charging point. Met. Police have isolated power switch to EV charging. LFB have placed a safety cordon tape around the hazard area. Duty of care left with Met. Police. Recorded by LFB.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fortune Green Road, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: In Newlands Park, Penge, approaching the junction with Lennard Rd, on the red triangular 'left hand bend advance warning' sign, the sign light is out., 12th October
item.description:
In Newlands Park, Penge, approaching the junction with Lennard Rd, on the red triangular 'left hand bend advance warning' sign, the sign light is out. Seen after dusk on 11/10/25.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newlands Park, Penge, London

item.title: Road surface, 12th October
item.description:
Park mead road is dangerously uneven and is cracking. Seems as though road is subsiding in parts and some parts are dangerously uneven and dips dangerous when driving. Not sure if this is causing damage to peoples homes on the street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Mead, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10 street Lamps out, 11th October
item.description:
There are 10 street lamps out going up kings Highway SE18 8 on Wickes side going up to the cemetery And 2 on flat side opposite Wickes. The 8 on Wickes side is from 2nd lamp post from junction of Wickham street and kings Highway going up to lamp post past cemetery main gate These need to be sorted as it is very dark along kings Highway and NOT VERY SAFE
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, Kings Highway, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegitation residents, 11th October
item.description:
Vegitation from resident property Footpath 44 This is not the council responsibility to cut overhanging bushes onto public Footpath. But the residents whose property that backs onto the Footpath
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swanton Road, Lessness Heath, London

item.title: Urban clearway signs place with no infromation, 11th October
item.description:
